text: Va [jod kun az] Zu-n-nun [Junus] on goh ki xasmgin [az mijoni qavmas] raft va cunin pindost, ki Mo hargiz ʙar u tang namegirem [va ʙa xotiri in kor mucozotas namekunem]. Pas, [vaqte mohi uro furu ʙurd] dar torikiho nido dod, ki: “[Parvardigoro] Hec ma'ʙude [ʙa haq] cuz tu nest. Tu munazzahi. Be tardid, man az sitamgoron ʙudaam”
